Delete non-existent, partially downloaded, and read chapter folders
Compress images before downloading or loading in reader, requires a Bandwidth Hero Proxy server
Higher values mean that a higher percentage of the image quality is saved, but it also means the file size is larger, 80 percent is a good median between file size and image quality
The Jpeg file size is considerably smaller then Webp is(meaning more data is saved), but it makes the images lose more quality as well.\nCurrently compresses to Jpeg
The Jpeg file size is considerably smaller then Webp is(meaning more data is saved), but it makes the images lose more quality as well.\nCurrently compresses to Webp
Put Bandwidth Hero Proxy server url here
Expand all search filters by default
Use HIGHLY EXPERIMENTAL automatic ReCAPTCHA solver. Will be grayed out if unsupported by your device.
Put the recommendations button in the overflow menu instead of on the manga page
Use last saved pre-migration preferences and sources to mass migrate
Launch global updates only for ungrouped, category updates for others
Launch category updates all the time
Do you want the latest tab to be the first tab in browse? This will make it the default tab when opening browse, not recommended if you\'re on data or a metered network
Filter the sources that are in categories, making the sources not get put under the language if they are in a category
Replace latest button with a custom browse view that includes both latest and browse
Allow local source to read hidden folders
If a manga is in any of these categories, chapters will not be deleted when marking as read and when finishing a chapter.\nCategories:\n%1$s
You have biometric lock times. Tap the plus button to create one.
A lock time conflicts with one that already exists!
Days to have the app locked
Higher values can speed up image downloading significantly, but can also trigger bans. Recommended value is 2 or 3. Current value is: %s
Slowly download the entire chapter while reading instead of just loading the pages you are viewing.

Normally, pressing the retry button on a failed download will wait until the downloader has finished downloading the last page before beginning to re-download the failed page. Enabling this will force the downloader to begin re-downloading the failed page as soon as you press the retry button.

The amount of pages to preload when reading. Higher values will result in a smoother reading experience, at the cost of higher cache usage, it is recommended to increase the amount of cache you allocate when using larger values
The amount of images to save on device while reading. Higher values will result in a smoother reading experience, at the cost of higher disk space usage
Preserve reading position on read manga
Use auto webtoon mode for manga that are detected to likely use the long strip format
Tapping will scroll by page instead of screen size when this option is enabled
Customize what buttons appear at the bottom of the reader
Enables vertical seekbar when in landscape
Switches which side the seekbar is on
Removes vertical seekbar entirely in favour of horizontal
Automatically scroll to the next page in the specified interval. Interval is specified in seconds.
Re-add all failed pages to the download queue.

Normally the downloader can only download a specific amount of pages at the same time. This means you can be waiting for a page to download but the downloader will not start downloading the page until it has a free download slot. Pressing \'Boost page\' will force the downloader to begin downloading the current page, regardless of whether or not there is an available slot.
While using automatic page layout, you can still switch between layouts while reading without overriding this setting
The cover will be updated when you exit manga info edit
An error occurred while loading your saved searches.
An error occurred while deleting the search.
Are you sure you wish to delete your saved search query: \'%1$s\'?
Saved search invalid, filters have changed
Too many watched sources, cannot add more then 5
You don\'t have any watched sources, go to the sources tab and long press a source to watch it

plurals.name: pref_tag_sorting_desc
plurals.item: No tags in sorting list. This adds a option in the library to sort by a priority based tag list, which means manga will be sorted in a way to prioritise the ones with the tags you want
%1$d tag in sorting list. This adds a option in the library to sort by a priority based tag list, which means manga will be sorted in a way to prioritise the ones with the tags you want
%1$d tags in sorting list. This adds a option in the library to sort by a priority based tag list, which means manga will be sorted in a way to prioritise the ones with the tags you want

resources.string:
Read this! Tags must be exact, there are no partial matches, you cannot do netorare to filter out female:netorare or similar!
The style for namespace tags is
"female: sole female"
without quotes!
Adding multiple variants of the same tag is supported, so feel free to do "tag: netorare" for NHentai and "female: netorare" for E-Hentai!
You have no tags. Tap the plus button to create one for sorting your library by tags
This extension is redundant and will not be used inside this version of Tachiyomi.
You have no additional repos. Tap the plus button to create one for adding external extensions.
Add additional repos to Tachiyomi, the format of a repo is \'username/repo\' , with username being the repo owner, and repo being the repo name
To show this screen again, go to Settings -> Library.
Select a source to migrate from
Include extra search parameter when searching
Use source with the most chapters (slower)
No chapters found, this manga cannot be used for migration
%1$s Sync will not start until the gallery is in only one category.

%1$s\n\nSync is currently throttling (to avoid being banned from ExHentai) and may take a long time to complete.

1. Changes to category names in the app are NOT synced! Please change the category names on ExHentai instead. The category names will be copied from the ExHentai servers every sync.

2. The favorite categories on ExHentai correspond to the first 10 categories in the app (excluding the \'Default\' category). Galleries in other categories will NOT be synced!

3. ENSURE YOU HAVE A STABLE INTERNET CONNECTION WHEN SYNC IS IN PROGRESS! If the internet disconnects while the app is syncing, your favorites may be left in a partially-synced state.

4. Keep the app open while favorites are syncing. Android will close apps that are in the background sometimes and that could be bad if it happens while the app is syncing.

5. Do NOT put favorites in multiple categories (the app supports this). This can confuse the sync algorithm as ExHentai only allows each favorite to be in one category.

This dialog will only popup once. You can read these notes again by going to \'Settings > E-Hentai > Show favorites sync notes\'.
Resetting the sync state can cause your next sync to be extremely slow.
